name: Star of Lemutia: Reborn
description:
This is a hardcore, real-time , tactical game where you will operate two legions at the same time, each containing a powerful hero and four well-trained mercenaries. They will work together under your control to maximize their abilities in order to defeat powerful enemies.

You need to find the most valuable strategic points on the battlefield and command your heroes and mercenaries to implement the most effective tactics. You must develop a firm sense of timing and all other logistics to cast the hero's signature skills and inflict the most damage to your enemy.

There will be more and more enemies coming at you as the game goes on. You are able to kill all of them without any extra magical help. You can also build and upgrade your staff in the workshop, so as to later unleash it’s great power on the battlefield. You will also find magical staffs lost by ancient heroes during battles long ago. If you can find them you will be king of the battlefield.

Once you successfully complete a stage, you will unlock the new mode. You can revisit your favorite tasks in advanced mode, or you may want to challenge a more difficult but more interesting reversal mode.

Main feature

- Reverse mode. A unique feature of this game ; reverse mode reverses the enemy's attack route . This will require new strategy and logistical challenges as though 18 additional stages have been created for you to conquer.

- There are 21 combinations of the 7 heroes to choose from. Different hero combinations form completely different tactics

-There are 17 kinds of mysterious staffs which can be set with four kinds of gems to create the most powerful magic weapon.

-There are 53 kinds of enemies. They become more and more dangerous and difficult to defeat as the game goes on. Their power can even counter the hero's signature skills. There are a few very powerful army generals with the power to destroy your hero with one hit.

Good luck and Godspeed to you on this most dangerous journey, Never give up!
